attributes.action: Give people with Autistic Spectrum Conditions a chance to work
attributes.background: I was made redundant and realised that employers do not see past the word Autism. so lets stop this and get people with difficulties into employment where they will be supported.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do to help people with autism into employment.
